metadata.title: CVE-2019-14379 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
SubTypeValidator.java in FasterXML jackson-databind before 2.9.9.2mishandles default typing when ehcache is used (because ofnet.sf.ehcache.transaction.manager.DefaultTransactionManagerLookup),leading to remote code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14379` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjackson2-databind-java - 2.4.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm2').
